trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A tracking service that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> interface raises a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> event to notify the runtime tracking infrastructure that new instances of a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> should no longer be tracked.
The tracking service uses a ProfileRemovedEventArgs to provide the workflow <xref:System.Type> to the runtime tracking infrastructure.

For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> uses a ProfileRemovedEventArgs when it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileRemoved?displayProperty=fullName> event.

After a tracking service raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure will no longer associate a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> with the specified workflow <xref:System.Type> for that tracking service.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs"></xref> class.

If you use this constructor when you raise a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> event inside a tracking service, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs"></xref> class that applies to the specified workflow <xref:System.Type>.

A new instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs> is created with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> set to the specified <xref:System.Type>.
The workflow <xref:System.Type> for which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> should be removed.
Gets or sets the workflow <xref:System.Type> for which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> should be removed.

WorkflowType specifies the workflow <xref:System.Type> for which a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> no longer exists, and which, therefore, should no longer be tracked by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
